name: Minor Magnetism
entries: You affect an item made of metal that you can see with a small magnetic force. You generate one of the following effects:

items: You move the object up to 30 feet.
You bend a piece of non magical metal up to 45 degrees.

entries: Creatures cannot be damaged by the movement of the object affected by the spell, nor can the spell move more than 15 pounds at a time. This cannot affect an item currently wielded by a creature, unless the creature willingly allows it to be moved or the item is not.
